about_the_game:
Adds a set of stationery to the game that you can use to amuse the fairies in Free Mode!

  • Magnifying glass - allows you to enlarge the most interesting places.
  • Ruler - allows you to spank fairies.
  • Brush - allows you to tickle fairies.
  • Pencil - used for other purposes.
  • Pen - allows you to write on the body.
detailed_description:
Adds a set of stationery to the game that you can use to amuse the fairies in Free Mode!

  • Magnifying glass - allows you to enlarge the most interesting places.
  • Ruler - allows you to spank fairies.
  • Brush - allows you to tickle fairies.
  • Pencil - used for other purposes.
  • Pen - allows you to write on the body.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: Core i3,i5,i7,E3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 820M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: Core i3,i5,i7,E3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 820M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Fairy Massage: Stationery
